snippet: With only about a 50-50 chance of a first marriage lasting, there seems to be a societal desire to commemorate, and even celebrate, what has become an increasingly common milestone in people’s lives.
abstract: Many people are celebrating divorces with showers and extravagant parties; with only about a 50-50 chance of a first marriage lasting, there seems to be a societal desire to commemorate, and even celebrate, what has become an increasingly common milestone in people's lives.
lead_paragraph: With only about a 50-50 chance of a first marriage lasting, there seems to be a societal desire to commemorate, and even celebrate, what has become an increasingly common milestone in people’s lives.

headline.seo: The Unbridled Shower: Celebrating Divorce Not With a Whimper but a Bang
